troubleshooting.title: Location Not Detected
troubleshooting.shortdesc: If the app cannot detect your location, try the following steps.

condition.title: Applies to mobile devices with GPS capabilities.
condition.p: The app shows "Location unavailable" or does not display your correct location.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: Location services disabled, GPS signal blocked, or app permissions not granted.

step.cmd: Ensure location services are enabled on your device.
Grant location permissions to in your device settings.
Move to an open area to improve GPS signal reception.
Restart the app and try again.
